title: "Publications"

Turoman N, Heyard R, Schwab S, Furrer E, Vergauwe E, Held L (2022).
"Constructing and implementing PRECHECK: A checklist to evaluate
preprints on COVID-19 and beyond." _MetaArXiv Preprints_.
[doi](http://dx.doi.org/10.31222/osf.io/nb928).

Freuli F, Held L, Heyard R (2022). "Replication success under
questionable research practices - a simulation study." _MetaArXiv

Heyard R, Ott M, Salanti G, Egger M (2022). "Rethinking the Funding

Heyard R, Held L (2022). "When should data and code be made available?"

[doi](http://dx.doi.org/10.1111/1740-9713.01623).

Heyard R, Philipp T, Hottenrott H (2021). "Imaginary carrot or

Bieri M, Roser K, Heyard R, Egger M (2021). "Face-to-face panel

Heyard R, Hottenrott H (2021). "The value of research funding for

Severin A, Martins J, Heyard R, Delavy F, Jorstad A, Egger M (2020).

Heyard R, Timsit J, Held L, others (2020). "Validation of discrete

[doi](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/abs/10.1002/bimj.201800293).

Heyard R, Timsit J, Essaied WI, Held L, others (2019). "Dynamic
